title: （要人！全部入哂黎！）唔想手足白白犧牲就嗱嗱臨整個外媒list send 哂葉虎單野出去！

replies.msg:
整個外媒lists!

Right outside of Nam Pin Wai, where the attackers retreated to after the terrorist attack on 21/7, a car (car number TP8431) was discovered on 26/7, in which a Chinese Liberation Army hat, rattan canes(commonly used by attackers on 21/7), a katana and other weapons were discovered. An electricity bill of “Yip Foo” (葉虎) with registered address in Nam Pin Wai was also discovered. The name Yip Foo” (葉虎) is shared by a senior official of Chinese Liaison office responsible for the region, suggesting China’s involvement in the terrorist attack on 21/7.
香港無人敢報就send 俾鬼佬！

replies.msg:
Chinese government involves in terrorism in Hong Kong

HK: Right outside of Nam Pin Wai, where the attackers retreated to after the terrorist attack on 21/7, a car (car number TP8431) was discovered on 26/7, alongside a Chinese Liberation Army hat, rattan canes(commonly used by attackers on 21/7), a katana and other weapons. An electricity bill of “Yip Foo” (葉虎) with registered address in Nam Pin Wai was also discovered. The name is shared by a senior official of Chinese Liaison office responsible for the region, suggesting China’s involvement in the terrorist attack on 21/7.
